tool_schemas.name: hello_world
tool_schemas.description: Returns a friendly hello world message

tool_schemas.name: get_time
tool_schemas.description: Returns current server time

tool_schemas.name: ec2_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on EC2 resources. Accepts natural language queries about EC2 instances, security groups, VPCs, subnets, and key pairs.

query.description: Natural language query about EC2 resources (e.g., 'list running instances', 'show security groups', 'count instances by region')

tool_schemas.name: s3_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on S3 resources. Accepts natural language queries about S3 buckets, policies, and configurations.

query.description: Natural language query about S3 resources (e.g., 'list all buckets', 'show bucket policies', 'find large buckets')

tool_schemas.name: lambda_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on Lambda resources. Accepts natural language queries about Lambda functions, layers, and configurations.

query.description: Natural language query about Lambda resources (e.g., 'list all functions', 'show function runtimes', 'find functions with high memory')

tool_schemas.name: cloudformation_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on CloudFormation resources. Accepts natural language queries about stacks, resources, and templates.

query.description: Natural language query about CloudFormation resources (e.g., 'list all stacks', 'show failed stacks', 'find stack resources')

tool_schemas.name: iam_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on IAM resources. Accepts natural language queries about users, roles, policies, and groups.

query.description: Natural language query about IAM resources (e.g., 'list all users', 'show admin roles', 'find unused policies')

tool_schemas.name: rds_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on RDS resources. Accepts natural language queries about database instances, clusters, and configurations.

query.description: Natural language query about RDS resources (e.g., 'list all databases', 'show database engines', 'find large instances')

tool_schemas.name: cloudwatch_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on CloudWatch resources. Accepts natural language queries about metrics, alarms, and logs.

query.description: Natural language query about CloudWatch resources (e.g., 'show active alarms', 'list log groups', 'find high CPU metrics')

tool_schemas.name: cost_explorer_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on Cost Explorer. Accepts natural language queries about costs, billing, and usage.

query.description: Natural language query about costs and billing (e.g., 'show monthly costs', 'find expensive services', 'compare last 3 months')

tool_schemas.name: ecs_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on ECS resources. Accepts natural language queries about clusters, services, and tasks.

query.description: Natural language query about ECS resources (e.g., 'list all clusters', 'show running services', 'find failed tasks')

tool_schemas.name: eks_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on EKS resources. Accepts natural language queries about Kubernetes clusters and node groups.

query.description: Natural language query about EKS resources (e.g., 'list all clusters', 'show node groups', 'find cluster versions')

tool_schemas.name: sns_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on SNS resources. Accepts natural language queries about topics and subscriptions.

query.description: Natural language query about SNS resources (e.g., 'list all topics', 'show subscriptions', 'find topic policies')

tool_schemas.name: sqs_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on SQS resources. Accepts natural language queries about queues and messages.

query.description: Natural language query about SQS resources (e.g., 'list all queues', 'show queue attributes', 'find queues with messages')

tool_schemas.name: dynamodb_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on DynamoDB resources. Accepts natural language queries about tables and indexes.

query.description: Natural language query about DynamoDB resources (e.g., 'list all tables', 'show table indexes', 'find large tables')

tool_schemas.name: route53_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on Route53 resources. Accepts natural language queries about DNS zones and records.

query.description: Natural language query about Route53 resources (e.g., 'list hosted zones', 'show DNS records', 'find domain configurations')

tool_schemas.name: apigateway_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on API Gateway resources. Accepts natural language queries about APIs and deployments.

query.description: Natural language query about API Gateway resources (e.g., 'list all APIs', 'show API stages', 'find API methods')

tool_schemas.name: ses_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on SES resources. Accepts natural language queries about email identities and configurations.

query.description: Natural language query about SES resources (e.g., 'list verified emails', 'show sending statistics', 'find configuration sets')

tool_schemas.name: bedrock_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on Bedrock resources. Accepts natural language queries about foundation models and jobs.

query.description: Natural language query about Bedrock resources (e.g., 'list available models', 'show model capabilities', 'find customization jobs')

tool_schemas.name: sagemaker_read_operations
tool_schemas.description: Perform read-only operations on SageMaker resources. Accepts natural language queries about ML endpoints and models.

query.description: Natural language query about SageMaker resources (e.g., 'list all endpoints', 'show training jobs', 'find model artifacts')
